content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM - Mobile Devices Support is a special group, which is responsible for mobile devices (iPhones, iPads, Android devices, etc.) management in EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn information about its responsibilities in article “\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/FGK4Fg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM – Mobile Devices Support\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"”.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
